languages.text: "Точнее, являлся. Некоторое время назад транспортное средство "Навиика" высадило на поверхность Фолстоуна несколько тысяч беженцев с планеты Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла. Орден Молота воспринял это вторжение как акт агрессии и просит Вашу Светлость о защите".

"Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."
languages.original_text: "Точнее, являлся. Некоторое время назад транспортное средство "Навиика" высадило на поверхность Фолстоуна несколько тысяч беженцев с планеты Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла. Орден Молота воспринял это вторжение как акт агрессии и просит Вашу Светлость о защите".

traits.locale_text: "Or rather, it used to be. A while ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded on Foulstone several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your [mf|Lord|Lady]ship's protection."

"Or rather, it used to be. A while ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded on Foulstone several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your [mf|Lord|Lady]ship's protection."

"Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

"Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

"Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

languages.text: “或者说，他们原本是这里唯一的住民，但现在不是了。不久前，一艘名为‘纳维卡号’的运输船在这里卸下了几千名难民，那些难民都是从行商浪人温特斯凯尔的行星上逃出来的。重锤修会认为这种做法属于侵略行为，要求您为修道院提供保护。”
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

traits.locale_text: “或者说，他们原本是这里唯一的住民，但现在不是了。不久前，一艘名为‘纳维卡号’的运输船在这里卸下了几千名难民，那些难民都是从行商浪人温特斯凯尔的行星上逃出来的。圣锤修会认为这种做法属于侵略行为，要求您为修道院提供保护。”

languages.text: «Para ser exactos, lo era. Hace poco, una nave de transporte, la Naviica, trajo aquí a varios miles de refugiados de un planeta perteneciente al Comerciante Independiente Winterscale. La Orden del Martillo declara que esta invasión constituye una agresión y ruega a mi{mf|lord|lady} que les proteja».
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

traits.locale_text: «Para ser exactos, lo era. Hace poco, una nave de transporte, la Naviica, trajo aquí a varios miles de refugiados de un planeta perteneciente al Comerciante Independiente Winterscale. La Orden del Martillo declara que esta invasión constituye una agresión y ruega a mi{mf|lord|lady} que les proteja».

languages.text: "Oder besser gesagt ... war. Vor einiger Zeit hat ein Transportschiff, die Naviica, mehrere tausend Flüchtlinge von einem Planeten des Freihändlers Winterzunder entladen. Der Orden des Hammers hat diese Invasion als einen Akt der Aggression eingestuft und bittet um den Schutz Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

traits.locale_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

languages.text: « Ou du moins, elle l'était. Il y a quelque temps de cela, un vaisseau de transport, le Naviica, a débarqué des milliers de réfugiés originaires d'une planète appartenant au libre-marchand Winterscale. L'Ordre du Marteau qualifie cet acte d'invasion et demande la protection de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

traits.locale_text: « Ou du moins, elle l'était. Il y a quelque temps de cela, un vaisseau de transport, le Naviica, a débarqué des milliers de réfugiés originaires d'une planète appartenant au libre-marchand Winterscale. L'Ordre du Marteau qualifie cet acte d'invasion et demande la protection de Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: 「いえ、昔はそうだったと言うべきでしょうか。少し前、輸送船ナヴィーカ号が、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの持つ惑星から来た数千人の難民を運び降ろしました。鉄槌の修道会はこの件を侵略行為と判断して、陛下からの保護を求めています」
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ、昔はそうだったと言うべきでしょうか。少し前、輸送船ナヴィーカ号が、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの持つ惑星から来た数千人の難民を運び降ろしました。鉄槌の修道会はこの件を侵略行為と判断して、陛下からの保護を求めています」

languages.text: "Daha doğrusu öyleydiler. Bir süre önce Naviica isimli nakliye gemisi, Hür Tacir Winterscale'e ait bir gezegenden gelen birkaç bin mülteciyi buraya bırakmış. Çekiç Tarikatı, bu istilayı bir saldırı eylemi olarak değerlendiriyor ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin korumasını rica ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Or rather, it used to be. Some time ago, a transport vessel, the Naviica, unloaded several thousand refugees from a planet belonging to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The Order of the Hammer has judged this invasion to be an act of aggression and is asking for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's protection."
